title: 94/1067/Euratom: Council Decision of 15 December 1994 approving the provisional application of the Energy Charter Treaty by Decision of the Commission on behalf of the European Atomic Energy Community
header:
COUNCIL DECISION
of 15 December 1994
approving the  provisional application of the Energy Charter Treaty by Decision of the Commission on behalf of the  European Atomic Energy Community
(94/1067/Euratom)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN  UNION
main_body:
The provisional application by the European Atomic Energy Community  of the Energy Charter Treaty, to the extent that the Community has competence for the matters  governed by that Treaty, is hereby approved.
The text of the Treaty is attached to this Decision  (2).
This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 December 1994.
For the Council
The President
A. MERKEL
(1) OJ No C 372, 28. 12. 1994, p. 16.
(2) See page 24 of this Official Journal.
